children.http api: An authenticated user can make requests for transliteration via http
children.websocket api: Progressive parsing can be provided by passing partial results over the connection
children.parsing: Use system inspired by parse package
children.formats offered: Start with greek_1 and move on from there
children.models: Should not require any models other than account
children.size limits: Limit the rate at which data is parsed for a single user. This can be tracked as a variable on the account model
